document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Silver and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Street of Silver
document_data.locations: Locations on the Street of Silver
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Silver''' was a major road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Street of Silver spanned much of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It ran north to south, running parallel with the [[Street of Silks]] to the west and [[Warrior's Way]] to the east. The street originated in the north on [[Bazaar Street]] where it branched south to end on [[Waterdeep Way]]. Other roads connecting with the Street of Silver along its path included [[Keltarn Street]], [[Selduth Street]], [[Palfrey Lane]], and [[Cage Street]].
